dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset based on MNIST, consisting of images arranged in a 9 × 9 grid where each grid cell is filled with a colored MNIST digit or a solid color background. The program structure is a 2D repeating pattern of an MNIST digit, with natural noise introduced by rendering different MNIST digits with the same label and color in each iteration.
dcterms:title: Synthetic dataset

dcterms:creator: R. Tyleˇcek
R. ˇS´ara
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of 1855 images (1755 training, 100 testing) of building facades, scaled to a size of 256 × 256 × 3 pixels, containing repeating patterns of objects such as windows and doors.
dcterms:title: Facades dataset
